books.author: by Harlan Coben
books.description: Six years after the woman he loved married another man, Jake Fisher discovers that neither she nor their life together were what theyseemed, and he sets out to uncover the truth.
books.name: SIX YEARS

books.author: by J. Lynn
books.description: Nineteen-year-old Avery Morgansten hopes she can escape the tragedy in her past when she goes to college, but she begins to receive threats.
books.name: WAIT FOR YOU

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A New Hampshire baker finds herself in the midst of two Holocaust stories: her grandmother’s story of survival, and the confessions of an elderly German man, an SS officer.
books.name: THE STORYTELLER

books.author: by Kyra Davis
books.description:
In Book 2 of the Just One Night series, Kasie Fitzgerald is crazy about Robert, the man she slept with in Las Vegas, but Dave, her
fiancé, is furious.
books.name: EXPOSED

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: While Alex Cross pursues a Washington serial killer (or killers?), someone is after him.
books.name: ALEX CROSS, RUN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Maeve Binchy
books.description: An unlikely collection of guests gather at an inn by the sea on Ireland’s west coast; the final book by Binchy, who died in 2012.
books.name: A WEEK IN WINTER

books.author: by Jasinda Wilder
books.description: Years after her boyfriend’s accidental death, Nell Hawthorne encounters his older brother, and they embark on a painful but ultimately healing relationship.
books.name: FALLING INTO YOU

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: Three women on Blackberry Island, bound by the strongest of friendships, are at crucial turning points in their lives.
books.name: THREE SISTERS

books.author: by Stephenie Meyer
books.description: In this first adult novel by the author of the Twilight series for teenagers, aliens have taken control of the minds and bodies of most humans, but one woman won’t surrender; originally published in 2008.
books.name: THE HOST

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A mysterious young woman, while putting down roots in a small North Carolina town, is still haunted by a dark secret from her past.
books.name: SAFE HAVEN

books.author: by Kyra Davis
books.description: Kasie Fitzgerald sleeps with a man in Las Vegas. She meant for it to be just one night, but she winds up wanting more. Then he offers to engage her P.R. firm. Part 1 of the Just One Night series.
books.name: THE STRANGER

books.author: by J.C. Reed
books.description: Brooke Stewart, a New York real estate agent who avoids relationships, embarks on an affair with Jeff Mayfield, a millionaire playboy.
books.name: SURRENDER YOUR LOVE

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An innocent college student falls in love with a tortured man with particular sexual tastes; the first of a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by Jean Hanff Korelitz
books.description: A Princeton admissions officer is shaken when issues from her past resurface; originally published in 2009 and the basis of the recently released movie.
books.name: ADMISSION
